title: Experience in TFT?
body:
Hey there,

Today i noticed that after playing multiple games of TFT i didn't gain any experience at all. 
Is there really no experience gained after TFT? it really confuses me.

Kind Regards,
Dirty Necro

replies.body: There was never any experience in TFT, it counts as a game if you have missions, and you get TFT beta points for the quests they have setup but that's about it.
It's a totally different game type, so it doesn't make sense to get XP linked with Summoner's Rift when you aren't playing anything close.
